anathema: Break your word, be cruel to the innocent, rebuke someone due to their homeland
description: Chohar is one of the three Old Sun Gods of Mzali, the Lion God of justice, loyalty, and work. He is commonly depicted as a golden lion with a sun for a mane. Due to their shared love of justice, some priests of Walkena claim that the Child-God is a descendant of Chohar, even though Walkena's vindictive and cruel justice contrasts with Chohar's duty.
edicts: Finish any and all tasks you accept, bring those who are cruel to justice, show pride in your home and your heritage
name: Chohar
titles: Lion God of justice, loyalty, and work
